00018 class is_alphabet
00019 {
00020 public:
00021   static bool value(char c)
00022   {
00023     return c>='a' && c<='z'||c>='A' && c<= 'Z';
00024   }
00025 
00026   static bool is_upper(char c)
00027   {
00028     return c>='A' && c<= 'Z';
00029   }
00030 
00031   static bool is_lower(char c)
00032   {
00033     return c>='a' && c<='z';
00034   }
00035 
00036   static char to_lower(char c)
00037   {
00038     if (is_upper(c))
00039       return c - ('A'-'a');
00040 
00041     return c;    
00042   }
00043 
00044   static char to_upper(char c)
00045   {
00046     if (is_lower(c))
00047       return c + ('A'-'a');
00048     return c;
00049   }
00050 
00051   static bool equal_ignore_case(char c1, char c2)
00052   {
00053     return c1==c2 || c1-c2=='A'-'a' || c1 - c2=='a'-'A';
00054   }
00055 
00056   static bool is_space(char c)
00057   {
00058     return c == ' ';
00059   }
00060 
00061   static bool is_new_line(char c)
00062   {
00063     return (c == '\n');
00064   }
00065   
00066 
00067 }
00068   ;

00071 class is_numeric
00072 {
00073 public:
00074   static bool value(char c)
00075   {
00076     return c>='0' && c<='9';
00077   }
00078 
00079   static bool is_positive(char c)
00080   {
00081     return c=='+';
00082   }
00083 
00084   static bool is_negative(char c)
00085   {
00086     return c=='-';
00087   }
00088   
00089   static unsigned char numeric_value(char c)
00090   {
00091     if (!value(c))
00092       return 0;
00093     
00094     return c- '0';
00095   }
00096 
00097   static bool is_dot(char c)
00098   {
00099     return c == '.';
00100   }
00101 
00102   static char dot()
00103   {
00104     return '.';
00105   }
00106   
00107 }
00108   ;

00114 template <
00115   class StringT = std::string,
00116   class IS_NUMERIC = is_numeric,
00117   class IS_ALPHABET = is_alphabet
00118   >
00119 class Algorithm
00120 {
00121   typedef typename StringT::value_type CharT;
00122   typedef typename StringT::size_t size_t;
00123   
00124 public:
00125   enum StrCompMode { SM_SENSITIVE, SM_IGNORE };
00126   
00127   //*******************KMP**********************
00128   static void get_nextval(const StringT& s, uint64_t next[], StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE)
00129   {
00130     // 求模式串T的next函数值并存入数组 next。
00131     uint64_t j = 0, k = -1;
00132 
00133     next[0] = -1;
00134 
00135     while ( j < s.length()-1 )
00136     {
00137       if (k == (uint64_t)-1 
00138           || caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && s[j]== s[k]
00139          || caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(s[j], s[k]) )
00140       {
00141         ++j; ++k;
00142 
00143         if (caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && s[j]!= s[k]
00144             ||caseChk==SM_IGNORE && !IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(s[j], s[k]) )
00145           next[j] = k;
00146         else
00147           next[j] = next[k];
00148       }// if
00149       else
00150         k = next[k];
00151     }// while
00152   }// get_nextval　
00153 
00154   static uint64_t KMP(const StringT& text,const StringT& pattern, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE) //const 表示函数内部不会改变这个参数的值。
00155   {
00156 
00157     if( text.length()==0 || pattern.length()==0 )//
00158       return -1;//空指针或空串，返回-1。
00159 
00160     uint64_t len= pattern.length();
00161 
00162     uint64_t *next= (uint64_t*)hlmalloc((len+1)*sizeof (uint64_t));
00163 
00164     get_nextval(pattern,next, caseChk);//求Pattern的next函数值
00165 
00166     uint64_t index=0,i=0,j=0;
00167 
00168     while(i < text.length() && j < pattern.length())
00169     {
00170       if(caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && text[i]== pattern[j]
00171          || caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(text[i], pattern[j]) )
00172       {
00173         ++i;// 继续比较后继字符
00174         ++j;
00175 
00176       }
00177       else
00178       {
00179         index += j-next[j];
00180 
00181         if(next[j]!=(uint64_t)-1)
00182 
00183           j=next[j];// 模式串向右移动
00184         else
00185         {
00186           j=0;
00187           ++i;
00188         }
00189       }
00190     }//while
00191 
00192     hlfree(next);
00193 
00194     if(j == pattern.length())
00195       return index;// 匹配成功
00196     else
00197       return -1;      
00198 
00199   }
00200 
00201   //*******************rKMP**********************  
00202   static void rget_nextval(const StringT& s, uint64_t next[], StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE)
00203   {
00204     // 求模式串T的next函数值并存入数组 next。
00205 
00206     uint64_t j = s.length()-1, k = s.length();
00207 
00208     next[s.length()] = s.length();
00209 
00210     while ( j >0 )
00211     {
00212       if (k == s.length()
00213           || caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && s[j]== s[k]
00214           || caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(s[j], s[k]) )
00215       {
00216         --j; --k;
00217 
00218         if (caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && s[j]!= s[k]
00219             ||caseChk==SM_IGNORE && !IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(s[j], s[k]) )
00220           next[j+1] = k;
00221         else
00222           next[j+1] = next[k+1];
00223 
00224       }// if
00225       else
00226         k = next[k+1];
00227 
00228     }// while
00229 
00230   }// get_nextval　
00231 
00232   static uint64_t rKMP(const StringT& text,const StringT& pattern, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE) //const 表示函数内部不会改变这个参数的值。
00233   {
00234 
00235     if( text.length()==0 || pattern.length()==0 )//
00236       return -1;//空指针或空串，返回-1。
00237 
00238     uint64_t len= pattern.length();
00239 
00240     uint64_t *next= (uint64_t*)hlmalloc((len+1)*sizeof (uint64_t));
00241 
00242     rget_nextval(pattern,next, caseChk);//求Pattern的next函数值
00243     
00244     uint64_t index=text.length()-1,i=text.length()-1,j=pattern.length()-1;
00245 
00246     while(i !=(uint64_t)-1  && j !=(uint64_t)-1 )
00247     {
00248       if(caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && text[i]== pattern[j]
00249          || caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(text[i], pattern[j]) )
00250       {
00251         --i;// 继续比较后继字符
00252         --j;
00253       }
00254       else
00255       {
00256         index -= next[j+1] - j;
00257         
00258         if(next[j+1]!= pattern.length())
00259           j=next[j+1];// 模式串向右移动
00260         else
00261         {
00262           j=pattern.length()-1;
00263           --i;
00264         }
00265       }
00266 
00267     }//while
00268 
00269     hlfree(next);
00270 
00271     if(j == (uint64_t)-1)
00272       return index;// 匹配成功
00273     else
00274       return -1;
00275   }

00277     //*******************Data type**********************
00278   static int to_integer(const StringT& str) 
00279   {
00280     int r = 0;
00281     int k=1;
00282     
00283     for (typename StringT::const_reverse_iterator i= str.rbegin(); i!=str.rend();i++, k *= 10)
00284     {
00285       if (!IS_NUMERIC::value(*i))
00286       {
00287         assert(IS_NUMERIC::is_positive( *i) || IS_NUMERIC::is_negative( *i));
00288         
00289         if (IS_NUMERIC::is_negative( *i))
00290           return -1*r;
00291         return r;
00292       }
00293       
00294       r += IS_NUMERIC::numeric_value(*i)*k;
00295     }
00296     
00297     return r;
00298   }
00299   
00300   static long to_long(const StringT& str) 
00301   {
00302     long r=0;
00303     long k =1;
00304 
00305         
00306     for (typename StringT::const_reverse_iterator i= str.rbegin(); i!=str.rend();i++, k *= 10)
00307     {
00308       if (!IS_NUMERIC::value(*i))
00309       {
00310         assert(IS_NUMERIC::is_positive( *i) || IS_NUMERIC::is_negative( *i));
00311         if (IS_NUMERIC::is_negative( *i))
00312           return -1*r;
00313         return r;
00314       }
00315       
00316       r += IS_NUMERIC::numeric_value(*i)*k;
00317     }
00318 
00319     return r;
00320   }
00321   
00322   static unsigned long to_ulong(const StringT& str) 
00323   {
00324     unsigned  long r=0;
00325     unsigned long k =1;
00326 
00327         
00328     for (typename StringT::const_reverse_iterator i= str.rbegin(); i!=str.rend();i++, k *= 10)
00329     {
00330       r += IS_NUMERIC::numeric_value(*i)*k;
00331     }
00332 
00333     return r;
00334   }
00335   
00336   static float to_float(const StringT& str) 
00337   {
00338     float r = 0;
00339     float k = 1;
00340     
00341     size_t dot = str.find(IS_NUMERIC::dot());
00342     if (dot == StringT::npos)
00343       dot = str.length();
00344 
00345     size_t i=dot-1;
00346     for (; i!=(size_t)-1 && IS_NUMERIC::value(str[i]); i--, k *=10)
00347       r += IS_NUMERIC::numeric_value(str[i])*k;
00348 
00349     
00350     float o = 1;
00351     if (i!=(size_t)-1 && IS_NUMERIC::is_negative(str[i]))
00352       o = -1;
00353 
00354     k = 10.;
00355     for (i = dot+1; i<str.length() && str[i]>='0'&& str[i]<='9'; i++, k *=10)
00356       r += IS_NUMERIC::numeric_value(str[i])/k;
00357     
00358     r *= o;
00359 
00360     return r;
00361   }

00364   {
00365     for (typename StringT::iterator i=str.begin(); i!=str.end();i++)
00366     {
00367       *i = IS_ALPHABET::to_lower(*i);
00368     }
00369   }

00399   static bool equal_ignore_case (const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2)
00400   {
00401     if (str1.length()!=str2.length())
00402       return false;
00403 
00404     typename StringT::const_iterator j=str2.begin();
00405 
00406     for (typename StringT::const_iterator i=str1.begin(); i!=str1.end()&&j!=str2.end();i++, j++)
00407     {
00408       if (!IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(*i, *j))
00409         return false;
00410     }
00411 
00412     return true;
00413   }
00414 
00415   static bool equal_ignore_case_space(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2)
00416   {
00417     typename StringT::const_iterator j=str2.begin();
00418     typename StringT::const_iterator i=str1.begin();
00419 
00420     for (; i!=str1.end()&&j!=str2.end();i++,j++)
00421     {
00422       while (i!=str1.end() && IS_ALPHABET::is_space(*i))
00423         i++;
00424 
00425       while (j!=str2.end() && IS_ALPHABET::is_space(*j))
00426         j++;
00427 
00428       if (i==str1.end() || j==str2.end())\
00429         break;
00430       
00431       if (!IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(*i, *j))
00432         return false;
00433     }
00434 
00435     while (i!=str1.end() && IS_ALPHABET::is_space(*i))
00436       i++;
00437 
00438     if (i!= str1.end())
00439       return false;
00440     
00441     while (j!=str2.end() && IS_ALPHABET::is_space(*j))
00442         j++;
00443     if (j!= str2.end())
00444       return false;
00445 
00446     return true;
00447   }
00448 
00449   static size_t find(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2, size_t pos1 = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00450   {
00451     if (str2.length()>str1.length()-pos1)
00452         return -1;
00453 
00454     if (SM_SENSITIVE == caseChk)
00455       return str1.find(str2, pos1);
00456     else
00457     {
00458       size_t i = KMP(str1.substr(pos1), str2, caseChk);
00459       if (i == (size_t)-1)
00460         return -1;
00461       return pos1 + i;
00462     }
00463   }
00464 
00465   static size_t rfind(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2, size_t pos1 = StringT::npos, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00466   {
00467     if (pos1 == StringT::npos &&  str2.length()>str1.length())
00468         return -1;
00469     if (pos1 != StringT::npos && str2.length()>pos1+1)
00470         return -1;
00471 
00472     if (SM_SENSITIVE == caseChk)
00473       return str1.rfind(str2, pos1);
00474     else
00475     {
00476       return rKMP(str1.substr(0, (pos1 == StringT::npos? pos1: pos1+1)), str2, caseChk);
00477     }
00478   }
00479 
00480   static size_t multi_find(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2, std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00481                  size_t pos1 = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00482   {
00483     indices.clear();
00484 
00485     size_t i = pos1;
00486 
00487     while (i!= (size_t)-1)
00488     {
00489       i = find(str1, str2, i, caseChk);
00490       if (i!= (size_t)-1)
00491       {
00492         indices.push_back(i);
00493         i += str2.length();
00494       }
00495       
00496     }
00497 
00498     return indices.size();
00499   }
00500   
00501   static bool start_with(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2, size_t pos1 = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00502   {
00503     if (str2.length()>str1.length()-pos1)
00504         return false;
00505     
00506     size_t i = pos1;
00507     size_t j = 0;
00508       
00509     if (SM_SENSITIVE == caseChk)
00510     {
00511       for (; j<str2.length();i++, j++)
00512       {
00513         if (str1[i] != str2[j])
00514           return false;
00515       }
00516     }
00517     else
00518     {
00519       for (; j<str2.length();i++, j++)
00520       {
00521         if (!IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str1[i], str2[j]))
00522           return false;
00523       }
00524     }
00525 
00526     return true;
00527   }
00528 
00529   
00530   static bool end_with(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2, size_t pos1 = StringT::npos, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00531   {
00532     if (pos1 == StringT::npos)
00533       pos1 = str1.length()-1;
00534     
00535     if (str2.length()>pos1+1)
00536         return false;
00537     
00538     size_t i = pos1;
00539     size_t j = str2.length()-1;
00540       
00541     if (SM_SENSITIVE == caseChk)
00542     {
00543       for (; j!=(size_t)-1; i--, j--)
00544       {
00545         if (str1[i] != str2[j])
00546           return false;
00547       }
00548     }
00549     else
00550     {
00551       for (; j !=(size_t) -1;i--, j--)
00552       {
00553         if (!IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str1[i], str2[j]))
00554           return false;
00555       }
00556     }
00557 
00558     return true;
00559   }
00560   
00561   static size_t num_occurrence(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2,
00562                                 size_t pos1 = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00563   {
00564     size_t r =0;
00565     size_t i = pos1;
00566     
00567     while (i!= (size_t)-1)
00568     {
00569       i = find(str1, str2, i, caseChk);
00570       if (i!= (size_t)-1)
00571       {
00572         i += str2.length();
00573         r ++;
00574       }
00575       
00576     }
00577 
00578     return r;
00579   }

00581   static void frequency_counter(const StringT& str, const std::vector<StringT>& patterns, std::vector<size_t>& freq,
00582                                 StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00583   {
00584     freq.clear();
00585     freq.reserve(patterns.size());
00586     
00587     for (typename std::vector<StringT>::const_iterator i=patterns.begin(); i!= patterns.end();i++)
00588     {
00589       freq.push_back(num_occurrence(str, *i, 0, caseChk));
00590     }
00591   }

00593   static size_t  substitute_char(CharT from, CharT to, StringT& str, size_t pos = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00594   {
00595     size_t r = 0;
00596     for (size_t i=pos; i<str.length(); i++)
00597       if (caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str[i], from)
00598           ||caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && str[i]==from)
00599       {
00600         r++;
00601         str[i] = to;
00602       }
00603     return r;
00604   }
00605 
00606   
00607   static StringT  substitute_char(CharT from, CharT to, const StringT& str, size_t pos = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00608   {
00609     StringT s = str;
00610     size_t r = 0;
00611     for (size_t i=pos; i<str.length(); i++)
00612       if (caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str[i], from)
00613           ||caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && str[i]==from)
00614       {
00615         r++;
00616         s[i] = to;
00617       }
00618     return r;
00619   }
00620 
00621   static size_t  multi_substitute_string(const StringT& from, const StringT& to,
00622                                    StringT& str, size_t pos = 0,
00623                                    StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00624   {
00625     std::vector<size_t> v;
00626     multi_find(str, from, v, pos, caseChk);
00627     
00628     StringT s;
00629 
00630     size_t last = 0;
00631     for (typename std::vector<size_t>::iterator i=v.begin(); i!=v.end(); i++)
00632     {
00633       assert(last<str.length());
00634       //std::cout<<str.substr(last, *i-last)<<last<<" "<<*i-last<<"\n";
00635       StringT ssss = str.substr(last, *i-last);
00636       //std::cout<<"jjjjjjjjjjjjj\n";
00637       s += ssss;
00638       s += to;
00639       last = *i+from.length();
00640     }
00641     
00642     s += str.substr(last);
00643     str = s;
00644     
00645     return v.size();
00646   }
00647 
00648   static StringT  multi_substitute_string(const StringT& from, const StringT& to,
00649                                    const StringT& str, size_t pos = 0,
00650                                    StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00651   {
00652     std::vector<size_t> v;
00653     multi_find(str, from, v, pos, caseChk);
00654     StringT s;
00655 
00656     size_t last = 0;
00657     for (typename std::vector<size_t>::iterator i=v.begin(); i!=v.end(); i++)
00658     {
00659       assert(last<str.length());
00660       s += str.substr(last, *i-last);
00661       s += to;
00662       last = *i+from.length();
00663     }
00664 
00665     s += str.substr(last);
00666     return s;
00667   }

00669   static StringT  substitute_string(const StringT& from, const StringT& to,
00670                                    const StringT& str, size_t pos = 0,
00671                                    StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00672   {
00673     StringT s = str;
00674     substitute_string(from, to, s, pos, caseChk);
00675     return s;
00676     
00677   }
00678 
00679   static void substitute_string(const StringT& from, const StringT& to,
00680                                    StringT& str, size_t pos = 0,
00681                                    StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00682   {
00683     size_t i = find(str, from, pos, caseChk);
00684     StringT s;
00685     if (i == (size_t)-1)
00686       return;
00687 
00688     s += str.substr(0, i);
00689     s += to;
00690     i += from.length();
00691     if (i<str.length())
00692       s += str.substr(i);
00693 
00694     str = s;
00695   }
00696 
00697   static size_t remove_newlines(StringT& str)
00698   {
00699     size_t r = 0;
00700     for (size_t i=0; i<str.length(); i++)
00701       if (IS_ALPHABET::is_new_line(str[i]))
00702       {
00703         r++;
00704         str[i] = ' ';
00705       }
00706     
00707     return r;
00708   }
00709 
00710   
00711   static StringT remove_newlines(const StringT& str)
00712   {
00713     StringT r = str;
00714     remove_newlines(r);
00715     return r;
00716   }
00717 
00718   static void remove_duplicate_chars(StringT& str, CharT c)
00719   {
00720     StringT s;
00721     s.reserve(str.length());
00722     
00723     typename StringT::iterator i;
00724     int count = 0;
00725     
00726     for (i = str.begin(); i < str.end(); i++)
00727     {
00728       if (*i == c)
00729       {
00730         if (count > 0);
00731         else s += c;
00732         count++;
00733       }
00734       else {
00735         s += *i;
00736         count = 0;
00737       }
00738     }
00739 
00740     //std::cout<<s.getReferCnt()<<std::endl;
00741     str = s;
00742     //std::cout<<s.getReferCnt()<<std::endl;
00743   }
00744 
00745   static StringT remove_duplicate_chars(const StringT& str, CharT c)
00746   {
00747     StringT s = str;
00748     remove_duplicate_chars(s, c);
00749     return s;
00750     
00751   }
00752 
00753   static void remove_multi_whitespace(StringT& str)
00754   {
00755     remove_duplicate_chars(str, ' ');
00756   }
00757 
00758   static StringT remove_multi_whitespace(const StringT& str)
00759   {
00760     return remove_duplicate_chars(str, ' ');
00761   }

00763   static void make_tokens_with_delimiter(const StringT& str, const StringT& delimiter, std::vector<StringT>& tokens)
00764   {
00765     tokens.clear();
00766     
00767     if (str.length()<=delimiter.length())
00768       return;
00769 
00770     std::vector<size_t> indices;
00771     multi_find(str, delimiter, indices, 0, SM_SENSITIVE);
00772     tokens.reserve(indices.size()+1);
00773     indices.push_back(-1);
00774     
00775     size_t i = indices[0];
00776     if (i!=0)
00777       tokens.push_back(str.substr(0, i));
00778 
00779     for (; i<indices.size()-2;i++)
00780     {
00781       if (indices[i]+delimiter.length()>=indices[i+1])
00782         continue;
00783       tokens.push_back(str.substr(indices[i]+delimiter.length(),
00784                                   indices[i+1]==(size_t)-1? indices[i+1]: indices[i+1]-(indices[i]+delimiter.length())));
00785     }    
00786   }
00787 
00788   static StringT cut_range(const StringT& str, size_t start, size_t end) 
00789   {
00790     return str.substr(start, end - start + 1);
00791   }
00792 
00793   static void cut_range(StringT& str, size_t start, size_t end) 
00794   {
00795     str = str.substr(start, end - start + 1);
00796   }
00797 
00798   static StringT cut_delimiter(const StringT& str, size_t start, CharT delimiter) 
00799   {
00800     StringT s =str;
00801     cut_delimiter(s, start, delimiter);
00802     return s;
00803   }
00804 
00805   static void cut_delimiter(StringT& str, size_t start, CharT delimiter) 
00806   {
00807     assert(start < str.length());
00808     
00809     size_t i=start;
00810     
00811     while(str[i]!= delimiter)
00812     {
00813       i++;
00814       if (start + i >= str.length())
00815       {
00816         str.clear();
00817         return;
00818       }
00819     }
00820 
00821     if (i==start){
00822       str.clear();
00823       return ;
00824     }
00825     
00826     
00827     return cut_range(str, start, i-1);
00828   }
00829 
00830   static StringT cut_between_words(const StringT& str, const StringT& p1,
00831                                    const StringT& p2, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE) 
00832   {
00833     StringT s = str;
00834     cut_between_words(s, p1, p2, caseChk);
00835     return s;
00836   }
00837 
00838   static void cut_between_words(StringT& str, const StringT& p1,
00839                                 const StringT& p2, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE ) 
00840   {
00841     size_t i = find(str, p1, 0, caseChk);
00842     if (i==(size_t)-1)
00843     {
00844       str.clear();
00845       return;
00846     }
00847     
00848     size_t j = rfind(str, p2, StringT::npos, caseChk);
00849     if (j==(size_t)-1)
00850     {
00851       str.clear();
00852       return ;
00853     }
00854     
00855     if (i+p1.length()>=j)
00856     {
00857       str.clear();
00858       return ;
00859     }
00860     
00861     str = str.substr(i+p1.length(), j-i-p1.length()-1);
00862   }
00863 
00864   static StringT cut_word_after(const StringT& str, const StringT& tag, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00865   {
00866     StringT s = str;
00867     cut_word_after(s, tag, caseChk);
00868     return s;
00869   }
00870 
00871   static void cut_word_after(StringT& str, const StringT& tag, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00872   {
00873     size_t index = find(str, tag,0, caseChk);
00874     if (index!=(size_t)-1)
00875     {
00876       size_t i = index + tag.length();
00877       for (; i < str.length() && IS_ALPHABET::is_space(str[i]); i++);
00878       
00879       if (i == str.length())
00880       {
00881         str.clear();
00882         return ;
00883       }
00884       
00885       
00886       size_t start = i;
00887       for (; i < str.length() && !IS_ALPHABET::is_space(str[i]); i++);
00888       
00889       cut_range(str, start, i - 1);
00890       return;
00891     }
00892     
00893     str.clear();
00894   }
00895 
00896   static StringT cut_line_after(const StringT& str, const StringT& tag, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00897   {
00898     StringT s = str;
00899     cut_line_after(s, tag, caseChk);
00900     return s;
00901   }
00902 
00903   static void cut_line_after(StringT& str, const StringT& tag, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00904   {
00905     size_t index = find(str, tag, 0, caseChk);
00906     if (index!=(size_t)-1)
00907     {
00908       size_t i = index + tag.length();
00909       if (i == str.length())
00910       {
00911         str.clear();
00912         return;
00913       }
00914 
00915       size_t start = i;
00916       for (; i < str.length() && !IS_ALPHABET::is_new_line(str[i]); i++);
00917       
00918       cut_range(str, start, i - 1);
00919       return;
00920     }
00921     
00922     str.clear();
00923   }
00924 
00932   static void take_between_marks(const StringT& str, CharT beg, CharT end,
00933                           std::vector<StringT>& arrayOfstrings) 
00934   {
00935     arrayOfstrings.clear();
00936     
00937     if (beg == end)
00938       return;
00939     
00940     size_t index = -1;
00941     size_t level = 0;
00942     size_t step = 0;
00943     
00944     for (typename StringT::const_iterator i = str.begin();
00945          i != str.end(); i++)
00946     {
00947       if (*i == beg) {
00948         index++;
00949         level++;
00950       }
00951       else if (*i == end) {
00952         if (level > 0) {
00953           level--;
00954           if (level == 0)
00955             step = 0;
00956           else
00957             step++;
00958         }
00959       }
00960       else if (level > 0) {
00961         CharT temp = *i;
00962         size_t finalIndex = index - step;
00963         while (finalIndex >=arrayOfstrings.size())
00964         {
00965           arrayOfstrings.push_back(StringT());
00966         }
00967         
00968         arrayOfstrings[finalIndex] += temp;
00969       }
00970       else;
00971     }
00972   }
00973 
00974   static void take_between_mark(const StringT& str, CharT mark,
00975                                   std::vector<StringT>& arrayOfstrings) 
00976   {
00977     arrayOfstrings.clear();
00978     
00979     size_t index = 0;
00980     size_t prev = 0;
00981 
00982     index = str.find(mark);
00983     prev = index;
00984 
00985     index = str.find(mark, index+1);
00986     while (index != (size_t)-1) {
00987       arrayOfstrings.push_back(cut_range(str, prev+1, index - 1));
00988       prev = index;
00989       index = str.find(mark, index+1);
00990     }
00991   }

00997   static StringT reverse_cut_rear_with(const StringT& str, CharT tag,
00998                                        bool includeTag = false, StrCompMode caseChk = SM_IGNORE) 
00999   {
01000     StringT s = str;
01001     reverse_cut_rear_with(s, tag, includeTag, caseChk);
01002     return s;
01003   }
01004 
01005   static void reverse_cut_rear_with(StringT& str, CharT tag,
01006                                        bool includeTag = false, StrCompMode caseChk = SM_IGNORE) 
01007   {
01008     size_t i;
01009     for (i = str.length()-1; i!=(size_t)-1; i--) {
01010       if (caseChk == SM_SENSITIVE && str[i]==tag
01011           || caseChk == SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str[i],tag))
01012         break;
01013     }
01014 
01015     if (i!=(size_t)-1) {
01016       if (includeTag)
01017         cut_range(str, i, str.length()-1);
01018       else if (i < str.length()-1)
01019         cut_range(str, i+1, str.length()-1);
01020 
01021       return;
01022       
01023     }
01024 
01025     str.clear();
01026   }
01027 
01028   static StringT reverse_cut_front_with(const StringT& str, CharT tag,
01029                                        bool includeTag = false, StrCompMode caseChk = SM_IGNORE) 
01030   {
01031     StringT s = str;
01032     reverse_cut_front_with(s, tag, includeTag, caseChk);
01033     return s;
01034   }
01035 
01036   static void reverse_cut_front_with(StringT& str, CharT tag,
01037                                         bool includeTag = false, StrCompMode caseChk = SM_IGNORE) 
01038   {
01039     size_t i;
01040     for (i = str.length()-1; i!=(size_t)-1; i--)
01041       if (caseChk == SM_SENSITIVE && str[i]==tag
01042           || caseChk == SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str[i],tag))
01043         break;
01044 
01045     if (i!=(size_t)-1) {
01046       if (includeTag)
01047         cut_range(str, 0, i);
01048       else if (i!=0)
01049         cut_range(str, 0, i-1);
01050       return;
01051     }
01052 
01053     str.clear();
01054   }

01056   static StringT compact_head(const StringT& str)

01059     
01060     compact_head(s);
01061     return s;
01062

01065   static void compact_head(StringT& str)
01066   {
01067     size_t i=0;
01068     for (; i<str.length(); i++)
01069       if (!IS_ALPHABET::is_space(str[i]))
01070         break;
01071 
01072     str = str.substr(i);
01073   }
01074 
01075   static StringT compact_tail(const StringT& str)
01076   {
01077     StringT s = str;
01078     compact_tail(s);
01079     return s;
01080   }
01081 
01082   static void compact_tail(StringT& str)
01083   {
01084     size_t i=str.length()-1;
01085     for (; i!=(size_t)-1; i--)
01086       if (!IS_ALPHABET::is_space(str[i]))
01087         break;
01088 
01089     str = str.substr(0, i+1);
01090   }
01091 
01092   static StringT compact(const StringT& str)
01093   {
01094     StringT s;
01095     s = compact_head(str);
01096     compact_tail(s);
01097     return s;
01098   }
01099   
01100   static void compact(StringT& str)
01101   {
01102     compact_head(str);
01103     compact_tail(str);
01104   }

01106   static StringT trim(const StringT& str)
01107   {
01108     StringT s;
01109     s.reserve(str.length()*3/4);
01110     
01111     size_t i=0;
01112     size_t last = i;
01113     for (; i<str.length(); i++)
01114     {
01115       if (!IS_ALPHABET::is_space(str[i]))
01116         continue;
01117       
01118       if (last<i )
01119       {
01120         s += str.substr(last, i-last);
01121       }
01122       
01123       last = i+1;
01124     }
01125     
01126     if (last < str.length())
01127       s += str.substr(last);
01128 
01129     return s;
01130   }
01131 
01132   static void trim(StringT& str)
01133   {
01134     const StringT s =str;
01135     str = trim(s);
01136   }

01138   static void read_from_file(const char* filename, std::vector<StringT>& lines, CharT line='\n')
01139   {
01140     std::ifstream file (filename, std::ios::in|std::ios::binary|std::ios::ate);
01141     // get length of file:
01142     file.seekg (0, std::ios::end);
01143     std::size_t length = file.tellg();
01144     file.seekg (0, std::ios::beg);
01145 
01146     // allocate memory:
01147     char* buffer = (char*)hlmalloc(length);
01148 
01149     // read data as a block:
01150     file.read (buffer,length);
01151     file.close();
01152 
01153     StringT s((CharT* )buffer, length/sizeof(CharT));
01154     hlfree(buffer);
01155     
01156     make_tokens_with_delimiter(s, line, lines);
01157   }
01158 
01159   static void write_to_file(const char* filename, const std::vector<StringT>& lines)
01160   {
01161     std::ofstream of(filename, std::ios::out|std::ios::binary);
01162 
01163     for (size_t i=0; i<lines.size(); i++)
01164     {
01165       for (typename StringT::const_iterator j = lines[i].begin(); j!=lines[i].end();j++)
01166       {
01167         CharT ch = *j;
01168         of.write((char*)&ch, sizeof(CharT));
01169       }
01170       CharT ch = '\n';
01171       of.write((char*)&ch, sizeof(CharT));
01172     }
01173 
01174     of.close();
01175   }

01205   static StringT generate_random_string(size_t size)
01206   {
01207     StringT s;
01208     s.reserve(size);
01209     CharT span = 'z'-'a';
01210 
01211     for (size_t i=0; i<size; i++)
01212       s += (CharT)(random()%span);
01213 
01214     return s;
01215   }

01217   static bool read_from_encode(const char* encode_type, const char* input, size_t len, StringT& output)
01218   {
01219     output.clear();
01220     
01221     iconv_t ic = iconv_open("ucs-2", encode_type);
01222     if (ic == (iconv_t)(-1))
01223       return false;
01224 
01225     size_t ilen = 0;
01226     size_t olen = 0;
01227     ilen = len;
01228     olen = ilen * 4;
01229     
01230     char *ibuf = const_cast<char *>(input);
01231     
01232     char *obuf_org = (char*)hlmalloc(olen);
01233     char *obuf = obuf_org;
01234     std::fill(obuf, obuf + olen, 0);
01235     
01236     size_t olen_org = olen;
01237     iconv(ic, 0, &ilen, 0, &olen);  // reset iconv state
01238     
01239     while (ilen != 0) {
01240       if (iconv(ic, &ibuf, &ilen, &obuf, &olen)
01241           == (size_t) -1) {
01242         //std::cout<<"oo"<<ilen<<std::endl;
01243         ibuf++;
01244         ilen++;
01245         //hlfree(obuf_org);
01246         //iconv_close(ic);
01247         //return false;
01248       }
01249       //std::cout<<"uu"<<ilen<<std::endl;
01250     }
01251 
01252     output.assign((CharT*)obuf_org, (olen_org - olen)/sizeof(CharT));
01253 
01254     hlfree(obuf_org);
01255     
01256     iconv_close(ic);
01257     
01258     return true;
01259   }
01260 
01261   static bool write_to_encode(const char* encode_type, char** output, size_t& len, const StringT& input)
01262   {
01263     iconv_t ic = iconv_open(encode_type, "ucs-2");
01264     
01265     if (ic == (iconv_t)(-1))
01266       return false;
01267     
01268     size_t ilen = 0;
01269     size_t olen = 0;
01270     ilen = input.size();
01271     olen = ilen * 4+1;
01272     char *ibuf = (char*)hlmalloc(ilen);
01273     char *ibuf_org = ibuf;
01274 
01275     input.copy((CharT*)ibuf, input.length());
01276 
01277     *output = (char*)hlmalloc(olen);
01278     char *obuf_org = *output;
01279     char *obuf = obuf_org;
01280     std::fill(obuf, obuf + olen, 0);
01281     
01282     size_t olen_org = olen;
01283     iconv(ic, 0, &ilen, 0, &olen);  // reset iconv state
01284     while (ilen != 0) {
01285       if (iconv(ic, &ibuf, &ilen, &obuf, &olen)
01286           == (size_t) -1) {
01287         //std::cout<<"jj"<<ilen<<std::endl;
01288         ibuf++;
01289         ilen++;
01290         //len =  olen_org - olen;
01291         //hlfree(ibuf_org);
01292         //iconv_close(ic);
01293 
01294         //return false;
01295       }
01296       //std::cout<<"yy"<<ilen<<std::endl;
01297     }
01298 
01299     len =  olen_org - olen;
01300     
01301     hlfree(ibuf_org);
01302     
01303     iconv_close(ic);
01304 
01305     return true;
01306   }

01308   static void release(char* p)
01309   {
01310     hlfree(p);
01311   }

01313   static void display(const StringT& str, const char* encode_t="UTF-8", std::ostream& os=std::cout)
01314   {
01315     char* buf=NULL;
01316     size_t len = 0;
01317 
01318     if (!write_to_encode(encode_t, &buf, len, str))      
01319       return;
01320     //buf[len-1] = '\0';
01321     
01322     os<<buf<<std::endl;
01323     release(buf);
01324   }
